UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel integrated computational AMP discovery approaches highlight diversity in the helminth AMP repertoire.
Literature.Author: Irvine AE, McKenzie D, McCoy CJ, Graham RLJ, Graham C, Huws SA, Atkinson LE, Mousley A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii DSM 30007(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=512µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus RN4220(MIC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MRSA-15(MIC=256µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis JH-2-2(MIC=256µg/ml)
